title: Cisco Systems Could Finally Rally Back to Its Bubble-Era Highs. Here’s How.
text:
Cisco Systems (CSCO) shares have been stuck in a summer funk, down almost 20% since mid-July.

But Evercore ISI analyst Amit Daryanani thinks that the networking giant stock has the potential to reach sharply higher prices. In a new research note, he lays out the case for how the stock, lately trading at a little around $47 a share, can hit $80—a potential 70% gain. That would take the stock back to its glory days — Cisco hasn’t traded at $80 a share since 2000, at the height of the internet bubble.

...
description: Evercore ISI analyst Amit Daryanani has laid out a case for how Cisco Systems stock could hit $80 -- a potential 70% gain and a level last seen during the dot-com bubble.
